backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a personal finance platform with user profiles, transactions, expenses, budgets, savings goals, AI predictions, quiz system, blog posts, chat sessions, and blob storage integration using AccessControl and Migration modules.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal migration module with empty OldActor and NewActor types and a run function that returns an empty record for state transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including Internet Identity authentication, backend data fetching for Dashboard/Transactions/Goals/Analytics pages, with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend React components and pages including Dashboard, Analytics, Transactions, AIInsights, Settings, AppLayout, and various public pages with their key functionality and data flow.
frontend/.env.example: Environment variable template defining VITE_APP_VERSION=242 and optional build metadata variables for deployment tracking.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with Google AdSense integration (pub-5050836253831761), Google Analytics (G-9VPK6GEC8Z), SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter cards, and structured data for FinanceWise AI platform.
frontend/netlify.toml: Netlify configuration with build settings, ads.txt serving rules, SPA routing redirects, security headers, and cache control policies for static assets.
frontend/public/_headers: HTTP headers configuration for ads.txt serving with text/plain content type, public caching, and noindex directive.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify redirect rules ensuring ads.txt is served directly and all other routes fall back to index.html for SPA routing.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Google AdSense ads.txt file declaring publisher ID pub-5050836253831761 as DIRECT with reseller ID f08c47fec0942fa0.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon with blue background, gold dollar/rupee symbol, green growth arrow overlay, and accent dots representing finance theme.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component with TanStack Router setup, Internet Identity authentication, profile setup dialog, QueryClient configuration, ThemeProvider, and routing for 11 private and 18+ public pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Access denied page component that prompts unauthenticated users to login with Internet Identity or navigate back to home.
frontend/src/components/AIChatbot.tsx: AI chatbot component with expandable UI that processes user messages, displays chat history with visual insights (charts, balance cards), and provides financial advice with disclaimers and follow-up suggestions.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsGuard.t: Guard component that checks user preferences and blocks access to analytics page if analyticsVisible is disabled, showing a message with navigation options to settings or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main application layout component with sidebar navigation, user profile dropdown, logout functionality, and conditional routing that renders different pages based on URL path and user preferences.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionBadg: Simple badge component that displays the application build version from buildInfo.
frontend/src/components/CookieConsent.ts: Cookie consent banner component that appears for unauthenticated users, stores consent in localStorage with 365-day expiry, and provides links to cookie and privacy policies.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer with multiple link sections (Quick Links, Resources, Learning, Trust & Security), social media icons, copyright notice, and version badge.
frontend/src/components/GoalDeleteConfir: Confirmation dialog component for deleting goals with warning icon, descriptive text, and cancel/confirm buttons with loading state.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header component with navigation menu, mobile sheet drawer, and login/signup buttons using TanStack Router for navigation.
frontend/src/components/PredictionResult: Displays AI-powered financial predictions with 3-month projections, risk levels, and charts showing income/expense forecasts based on transaction history.
frontend/src/content/defaultBlogPosts.ts: Exports default blog post data with two articles about monthly budgeting and emergency funds, including metadata and featured images.
frontend/src/content/defaultQuizQuestion: Contains an array of financial literacy quiz questions covering budgeting topics with multiple-choice options, explanations, and real-life tips.
frontend/src/content/staticProblemSoluti: Defines 13+ static problem-solution blog entries addressing common financial challenges like paycheck-to-paycheck living, emergency funds, and debt management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendVersion.ts: React Query hook that fetches the backend version string from the actor with infinite stale time.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrency.ts: Provides currency conversion and formatting utilities supporting USD, INR, and EUR with exchange rates and locale-specific formatting based on user preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useDefaultContentInit: Mutation hook that simulates default content initialization with a mock delay, invalidating blog and quiz queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOptimizedQueries.t: Empty file placeholder for optimized query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerformance.ts: Empty file placeholder for performance monitoring hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching blog posts, user data, and chat interactions with mock blog data, using TanStack Query for caching and the actor system for backend calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system for purple-violet-blue gradient theme, dark mode support, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/blog/blogContentCache.t: Local storage cache manager for generated blog content with 7-day expiration, providing save/load/clear operations for blog post HTML and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/blog/generateAdsenseArt: Generates full-length blog articles (800+ words) from metadata, with hardcoded content for personal finance topics including budgeting, investing, and financial fundamentals.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/budgetLo: Core budget calculation logic that generates budget plans using 50/30/20, 60/20/20, or 70/20/10 rules based on income, expenses, savings goals, and provides expense breakdowns with assumptions.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/healthSc: Calculates a financial health score (0-100) based on five weighted factors: savings rate, cash flow, emergency fund, debt management, and financial planning. Provides explanations and personalized advice based on the score.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/progress: Calculates completion progress percentage by weighting required fields at 70% and optional fields at 30%.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/projecti: Generates a 12-month savings projection showing monthly and cumulative savings based on budget plan allocations.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/recommen: Generates personalized financial recommendations for saving strategies, investing guidance, and financial improvement based on user inputs, savings rate, debt levels, and financial knowledge.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/reminder: Generates ICS calendar file content for budget action step reminders scheduled 7 days in the future with 15-minute advance alarms.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build metadata including version, timestamp, git SHA, and environment flags from Vite environment variables. Defines target version '242' with helper to check version match.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides currency conversion utilities between USD, INR, and EUR with exchange rates, formatting functions with locale-specific symbols, and a hook for user currency preferences.
Implements a deterministic AI assistant that classifies finance queries into categories (stocks, investing, budgeting, saving, expenses) and generates structured responses without external API calls, using user context data when available.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalCoachSuggesti: Generates expense optimization suggestions based on top spending categories with reduction percentages and estimated savings, plus provides static income boost ideas like freelancing and selling unused items.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalPlanning.ts: Computes goal planning metrics including remaining amount, progress percentage, required monthly/daily savings, and feasibility assessment based on income, with warnings for unrealistic goals.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalSimulation.ts: Generates three timeline simulation scenarios (current, +50% longer, -33% shorter) for savings goals, calculating required savings and feasibility for each scenario.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalTracking.ts: Computes tracking status and performance score for savings goals by comparing actual progress against expected progress based on elapsed time, with a scoring system that awards up to 70 base points and 30 bonus points for being ahead of schedule.
frontend/src/lib/quizProgressStorage.ts: Provides localStorage utilities for persisting quiz progress per authenticated user, including functions to load, save, clear, and update quiz state (questions asked, scores, completion status).
frontend/src/lib/serialization.ts: Comprehensive serialization utilities for converting between Motoko BigInt/timestamp types and JavaScript numbers/Dates, including recursive conversion functions to prevent BigInt serialization errors.
frontend/src/lib/transactions/monthlyAgg: Computes current-month income, expenses, available savings, and category totals from transaction data, with functions to retrieve top expense categories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Marketing page showcasing FinanceWise AI's mission, vision, values, and key features (innovation, security, transparency, community) using card-based layout with icons.
frontend/src/pages/AIInsights.tsx: Displays AI-powered financial insights including spending by category, monthly trends, savings rate analysis, and goal progress using charts (bar, line, pie) and highlights three ML models (Linear Regression, GRU, LSTM) used for predictions.
frontend/src/pages/AITransparency.tsx: Explains how the AI works by describing three ML models (Linear Regression, GRU, LSTM), their capabilities, limitations, and data usage policies in a transparent, user-friendly format.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Main analytics dashboard page displaying financial transactions, charts (spending trends, category breakdowns, pie charts), and forms to add income/expense transactions with category, payment type, and date fields.
frontend/src/pages/Benefits.tsx: Marketing page showcasing six key benefits of the FinanceWise AI app (financial health, privacy, time-saving, stress reduction, goal achievement, and free access) in a grid layout with icons.
frontend/src/pages/BlogAdmin.tsx: Admin page for initializing default blog content, providing a button to create 15 finance blog posts and 100 quiz questions with status feedback.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPost.tsx: Individual blog post display page that fetches a post by slug, renders it with AdSense article formatting, shows metadata (date, tags), and includes navigation back to the blog list.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPlanner.tsx: Budget planning tool that generates AI-powered budget allocations based on user's monthly income and mode (student/professional), analyzing transaction history and providing category-wise spending recommendations with health scores.
frontend/src/pages/CAFeatures.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Calculators.tsx: Financial calculators page with tabs for SIP, Lumpsum, FIRE, and Tax calculators, each computing investment returns, retirement corpus targets, or tax liabilities based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/Challenges.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Compare.tsx: Comparison page displaying a feature matrix table that contrasts FinanceWise AI capabilities (AI insights, educational content, blockchain storage, etc.) against competing financial tools.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact form page with email, response time, and support info cards; submits contact messages via useSubmitContactForm hook and displays success/error states.
frontend/src/pages/CookiePolicy.tsx: Cookie policy page explaining essential, analytics, and advertising cookies (including Google AdSense publisher ID), with sections on cookie types and user control options.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying balance, income, expenses, savings goals, category spending charts (bar, pie, line), recent transactions, and an AI prediction button that triggers PredictionResults component.
frontend/src/pages/DeploymentInfo.tsx: Admin page showing frontend/backend version comparison, build info, and version sync status with alerts for mismatches; requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Disclaimer.tsx: Legal disclaimer page emphasizing that FinanceWise AI is educational only, not financial/investment/tax/legal advice, and users should consult qualified professionals for decisions.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Displays a frequently asked questions page with an accordion component containing 10 FAQs about FinanceWise AI covering topics like security, pricing, features, and support.
frontend/src/pages/Features.tsx: Renders a features showcase page displaying 8 key features of the application (AI insights, analytics, goal tracking, security, calculators, education, expense tracking, investment portfolio) in a grid layout with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceBlog.tsx: Displays a blog listing page with a hero section and grid of blog post cards, fetching posts via useGetAllBlogPosts hook and linking to individual blog post pages by slug.
frontend/src/pages/FinancialWellness.tsx: Presents a financial wellness page with 6 cards highlighting holistic aspects of financial health including emotional comfort, financial psychology, security, peace of mind, growth mindset, and community support.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Comprehensive savings goals management page with CRUD operations, progress tracking, AI-powered goal planning metrics, expense optimization suggestions, income boost ideas, goal simulation scenarios, and detailed tracking status using multiple custom hooks and utility functions.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with call-to-action buttons, 6 feature cards highlighting key capabilities, and statistics grid showcasing the platform's offerings (100% free, 100+ quiz questions, 3 AI models, 24/7 assistant).
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorks.tsx: Displays a multi-step guide explaining how FinanceWise AI works, from account creation through Internet Identity to AI-powered financial insights and goal tracking. Includes hero section, step cards with icons and details, and CTA button to get started.
frontend/src/pages/Learning.tsx: Protected learning dashboard showing quiz statistics, progress tracking, and financial topics (budgeting, saving, investing, etc.) with 100 total questions. Displays achievements and allows users to continue the quiz.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with Internet Identity authentication, featuring branding section highlighting AI insights, blockchain security, and smart tracking. Redirects authenticated users to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyPsychology.tsx: Protected page with an 8-question financial psychology assessment that evaluates spending habits, risk tolerance, and money management style. Calculates personality type, risk profile, and provides personalized recommendations based on scores.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Privacy policy page explaining data collection, usage, sharing, security, retention, and user consent. Includes hero section and formatted content card with policy details.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Detailed privacy policy page with sections on information collection (personal, financial, usage data), data usage, and visual icons for each category. Includes header and footer components.
frontend/src/pages/public/Home.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, three feature cards (AI Insights, Real-Time Analytics, Secure & Private), and a call-to-action section encouraging user sign-up.
frontend/src/pages/Quiz.tsx: Interactive quiz page with multiple-choice questions on financial topics, featuring progress tracking, scoring, feedback with explanations, and real-life tips. Requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Resources.tsx: Resources hub page displaying categorized financial learning materials including educational guides, video tutorials, calculators, learning paths, templates, and blog articles with navigation to relevant sections.
frontend/src/pages/Roadmap.tsx: Product roadmap page showing completed v1.0 features and upcoming planned features (mobile app, bank integration, AI enhancements, multi-currency, social features, tax filing) with status badges and ETAs.
frontend/src/pages/Security.tsx: Security and privacy information page highlighting key security features: AES-256 encryption, blockchain storage, Internet Identity authentication, zero-knowledge architecture, no third-party access, and GDPR compliance.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityPrivacy.tsx: Comprehensive security and privacy policy page detailing data collection practices, data usage policies, storage security measures, and user rights with organized card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: User settings page for managing profile information, preferences (theme, notifications, analytics visibility), and currency selection with backend synchronization. Requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Displays a static Terms & Conditions page with sections covering agreement to terms, accounts, intellectual property, liability limitations, disclaimers, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Renders a comprehensive Terms & Conditions page with Header/Footer, featuring cards for agreement to terms, permitted/prohibited uses, account requirements, and prohibited activities with icons.
frontend/src/pages/Transactions.tsx: Provides a transaction history page with search, edit, and delete functionality, displaying transactions in a table with filtering by category/notes and currency formatting support.
frontend/src/pages/Updates.tsx: Displays version history and roadmap for the application, showing recent updates with features and upcoming planned features with status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/UseCases.tsx: Showcases six different user personas (students, professionals, homeowners, families, travelers, investors) with relevant financial scenarios and use cases for each.
frontend/src/requirements/REQ-10-quiz-no: Requirement document specifying that the existing finance quiz system must remain unchanged with no new quiz questions or bulk additions.
frontend/src/types/backend-types.ts: TypeScript type definitions mirroring backend Motoko types including UserPreferences, TransactionData, SavingsGoal, QuizQuestion, BlogPost, AIPrediction, and related enums.
frontend/src/types/budget-planner.ts: TypeScript interfaces for budget planning functionality including BudgetInputs with income/expense fields and BudgetPlan with allocation rules and breakdowns.
frontend/src/types/local-types.ts: Re-exports commonly used types from backend-types.ts for convenience in frontend components.
frontend/src/types/transaction.ts: Local Transaction type definition with bigint date fields, mirroring backend structure since it's not exported from backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for parsing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended animations, container queries, and typography plugins.
frontend/vercel.json: Vercel deployment configuration with build commands, environment variables for backend canister, SPA rewrites, and security headers.
project_state.json: Project state document describing backend-first architecture with Internet Identity authentication, Principal-based data isolation, and complete data persistence across all private pages.
unknown.txt: Performance optimization documentation fragment describing expected improvements (60-80% faster), monitoring dashboard, load testing recommendations, and success metrics for dashboard and chart rendering.
